articles.title: Preparatory Committee Formed by Association for Friendship with Korea
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Formed by Association for Friendship with Korea 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Association for Friendship with Korea having its branches in at least 90 countries inaugurated its preparatory committee for celebrating Feb. 16 on Feb. 1.
 The association elected its Chairman Alejandro Cao de Benos chairman of the preparatory committee and the representative of its Norwegian Branch secretary general of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to open an Internet special homepage on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported in Guinea
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported in Guinea 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Gouressiou Bari, head of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, in a statement on Jan. 25 supported the joint New Year editorial of the newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league in the DPRK.
 He said in the statement that laid down in the joint editorial are the important tasks for bringing about a turning phase in the movement for Korea's reunification, adding that the issue of Korea's reunification can be solved only through the patriotic movement for independent reunification, peace against war and great national unity.
 We are sure that if all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas wage a dynamic struggle by placing the interests of the nation above all and considering the idea of "By our nation itself" guidelines for all movements for reunification, they can realize the cherished desire of the nation as early as possible, he noted. He reiterated the group's resolution to extend invariable wholehearted support to the Korean people's just cause.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Syria to Mark February Holiday
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of his birthday.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Mohammad Shahta Jarab on Wednesday.

articles.title: International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
International Figure Skating Festival to Be Held 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The 15th International Figure Skating Festival for "Paektusan Prize" will be held in Pyongyang from Feb. 15 to 17 on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday.
 The festival will bring together ace figure skaters of the DPRK and other countries. It will be held in the form of demonstration presentations.    
 This annual event will prove to be a more meaningful sports festival as it will reflect the unanimous desire of the Korean people and world progressives and sportspersons to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il in grand style as a holiday common to mankind.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition for Celebrating Feb. 16 Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition for Celebrating Feb. 16 Opens 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A National Photo Exhibition for Celebrating Feb. 16 opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday with due ceremony.
 On display there are at least 250 photos showing the undying Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il under the titles of "Korea's Honor", "The Grand Festival of Victors", "The Immortal Footprints of the Songun Leadership", " Concentration and Mobilization of All Forces to Agricultural Front", "A New Aspect of Reconstruction and Modernization", "Let's Make New Leap Full of Confidence!", "Under the Banner of 'By Our Nation Itself'" and "DPRK-China Friendship Will Last Forever".
 Also attracting the visitors' eyes are photos dealing with the feats of Kim Jong Il who powerfully inspired the whole Party and army and all the people to the general march of the Songun revolution last year. They include photos titled "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Waving back to the Participants in the Military Parade for Celebrating the 60th Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "The Great Leader Comrade     Kim Jong Il Appreciating the Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang' Opened on the Occasion of the 60th Anniversaries of the Party Founding and Korea's Liberation".    
 Also on display are photos dealing with Kim Jong Il's immortal feats for national reunification and his historic visit to China at the outset of the year.
 Secretary of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok made an opening address at the ceremony.

articles.title: Hanchongryon Demands Stop to S. Korea-U.S. Negotiations
articles.content:
Hanchongryon Demands Stop to S. Korea-U.S. Negotiations 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) reportedly made public a statement titled "Stop the negotiations for signing a humiliating and treacherous 'free trade agreement' (FTA) between south Korea and the U.S." on Feb. 3.
 The statement accused the "government" of going to hold the negotiations for signing the FTA despite apprehension and resistance from various circles. It charged that the signing of the FTA would not only bring the farms of south Korea to a ruin but turn even its financial market into a gambling site of the U.S. and place all aspects of the people's life at the mercy of Americans. 
 This being a hard fact, the "government" intends to unilaterally sign the agreement, the statement deplored, adding that this is little short of offering the whole economy of south Korea to the U.S.    
 Hanchongryon will join the people from all walks of life in the struggle against the conclusion of the FTA and the moves of the U.S. to put the economy of south Korea under its domination and control, the statement declared.

articles.title: Hanchongryon Vows to Struggle for End to GNP
articles.content:
Hanchongryon Vows to Struggle for End to GNP 
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The 14th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) reportedly held a meeting in Maroni Park on the University Road in Seoul on Feb. 5 to vow to struggle for the disorganization of the Grand National Party (GNP), a traitorous party opposed to progressive education, democracy and reunification.
 Chairman of Hanchongryon Jang Song Hoe addressing the meeting said that the struggle for dissolving the GNP is for abolishing the "National Security Law" and this struggle is closely linked with the struggle for getting the Hanchongryon legalized. He declared that Hanchongryon would use the forthcoming local assembly election as an opportunity of heralding the end of the GNP come what may.    
 Hwang Yu Sok, chairman for national reunification of Hanchongryon, called for throwing overboard the GNP going reckless against the June 15 era and building a society in which the people have become its master.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Vow Loyalty to Kim Jong Il
National Seminar on Undying Feats of Kim Jong Il Held
60th Birthday of KCCP Observed
articles.content:
60th Birthday of KCCP Observed
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held on Wednesday to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party (KCCP).
 Present there were Chairwoman Ryu Mi Yong and members of the C.C., the KCCP, Adviser to the Korean Chondoist Church Central Guidance Committee O Ik Je, officials of the C.C., the KCCP, and office-bearers and members of the KCCP in Pyongyang.
 Present on invitation were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jung Rin, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae and Presidium Member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland Kang Ryon Hak.
 Kang Chol Won, vice-chairman of the C.C., the KCCP, said in a report that the KCCP has successfully carried out its noble patriotic duty and mission for the country and the nation, times and history under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for 60 years after its foundation.    
 The KCCP, a party friendly to the WPK, accepted as just the Juche-oriented and national ideas and lines set forth by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and aroused its party members and Chondoist believers to the building of a new country, the victorious Fatherland Liberation War, the post-war rehabilitation and construction and the building of a prosperous powerful socialist nation and has conducted the dynamic activities to speed up the independent and peaceful reunification of the country by the united efforts of the nation.    
 In particular, the Party has made all its efforts to realize the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forward by     Kim Il Sung and formulated by Kim Jong Il as the three charters for national reunification, and the five-point policy of great national unity put forward by Kim Jong Il and positively striven to implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
 The reporter stressed the need for the KCCP to step up the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and dynamically conduct the patriotic movement for independent reunification, peace against war and great national unity under the banner of "By our nation itself" to achieve the cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Joint Plenary Meeting of Chondoist Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint Plenary Meeting of Chondoist Organizations Held
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A joint plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Korean Chondoist Chongu Party (KCCP) and the Korean Chondoist Church Central Guidance Committee (KCCCGC) was held in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
 Present there were members of the C.C., the KCCP and members of the KCCCGC.
 The meeting discussed the tasks of the party members and Chondoist believers to vigorously conduct the patriotic movement for independent reunification, peace against war and great national unity under the banner of "By our nation itself".
 Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the C.C., the KCCP, made a report, which was followed by speeches.    
 The reporter and speakers said that when they dynamically conduct the above-said three-point patriotic movement under the banner of "By our nation itself" this year, a more signal advance will be made in developing the inter-Korean relations and accomplishing the cause of national reunification. They underscored the tasks of the party members and Chondoist believers to conduct the three-point patriotic movement more dynamically in solidarity with nationalist movement organizations of south Korea including Chondoist religion and Taejonggyo.    
 A relevant resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities Urged to Clarify Its Stand
Japan Urged to Apologize and Compensate for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Apologize and Compensate for Its Past Crimes
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are totally negating and distorting the Japanese imperialists' forcible drafting and abduction of Koreans and sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army, an intolerable insult to the victims and all other Koreans and a blatant artifice to fool the public opinion and a mockery of it, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
 Recalling that the Japanese reactionaries drastically downplayed, distorted, deleted and whitewashed in the history textbooks the aggressive and barbarous criminal acts committed by the Japanese imperialists and their harsh exploitation and plunder during their colonial rule, the article goes on:    
 The forcible drafting and abduction of Koreans were the most hideous crimes the Japanese imperialists committed against humanity in the past.
 During their occupation of Korea the Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted or abducted more than 8.4 million Koreans to use them as cannon fodder or forced them to do slave labor. They cruelly killed more than one million of them.
 One of the most horrendous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past was the crimes related to the "comfort women" for the Japanese army. They forcibly drafted or abducted 200,000 Korean women. They took them to battlefields, ruthlessly violating their pure conscience and chastity and ruining them physically. 
 Japan is the only country in the world that committed group sexual slavery directly organized and enforced by the government and the military.    
 The Japanese authorities have worked hard to evade their state and legal obligation though it is an issue to be settled by them in a responsible manner.
 With no crafty and shameless methods can Japan flee from its state responsibility to apologize and compensate for its invasion of Korea and the most hideous crimes it committed against its people. Its crafty behavior intended to distort and whitewash its past crimes so that they may be kept into oblivion is little short of adding to the crimes it has already committed as it goes against the trend of the times.

Choe Thae Bok Meets Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Palestinian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Mohammad Shahta Jarab, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, today when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
